replies.body: Why isnt firefox ahri on sale?? i swear they said it will be on sale in july and i checked this page every day and i havnt seen it on sale once...

There still another sale on the 31st july, so just wait till friday and see.
Hmm {{champion:122}} a good top laner or {{champion:56}} an impressive jungler.

I've never played Darius Top but in ARAM he is amazing.
Also played Nocturne for the first time last night. Went really well. He is really fun with Devourer and Ravenous Hydra

This doesn't help my case! lol. Well i am rather fond of  the jungle and i mained Gnar top for a while so i might go Nocturne because of his cool abilities and his ult looks so good for assassinations.
also as i come from Dota (dont judge i plays the LoLs now) Nocturne is similar to another character and i like their gameplays
Why isn't the sales coming on? The sales haven't changed yet.
They go on sale from **17:01PM AEST on July 28** through to 16:59PM AEST on August 1
Why isnt riven and jayce on sale i've been waiting for the whole month and it was on the sale list for july
You will have to wait. You might find that they are actually the last champions on sale for this month
